meanings.definition: A person who examines or inspects something.
meanings.sent1: The examiners carefully checked each document for errors.
meanings.sent2: The examiners inspected the car before it was sold.
meanings.sent3: The examiners found a hidden note in the old book, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: She had the eyes of an examiner, noticing every detail in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The examiners wore magnifying glasses to see the tiny details clearly.

meanings.definition: A person who administers an examination or test.
meanings.sent1: The examiners handed out the test papers to the students.
meanings.sent2: The examiners monitored the students during the exam.
meanings.sent3: The examiners accidentally gave the wrong test to the class, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: He felt like an examiner of life, testing people's reactions in different situations.
meanings.sent5: The examiners used a timer to ensure all students finished the test on time.
